sources.title: I Am Dragon (Drakon) | Full Movie | Epic Adventure Fantasy | English Subtitles
sources.description:
I Am Dragon (Drakon) - Princess Miroslava is kidnapped by a dragon and carried away into his castle on the remote island. Now the only things she has are a stone cage and a mysterious young man named Arman ... but who is he and what is he doing on that island?
2015.  Stars: Matvey Lykov, Mariya Poezzhaeva, Stanislav Lyubshin

metadata.Plot: The story about Akmal, a little boy and his policeman friend who find themselves in a fairy tale world trying to save a princess from Kara Bator, a ferocious dragon.
metadata.Actors: Sokrat Suleimanov, Dilnoza Rasulova, Vakhob Abdullayev
